Class.name: EnsPortal.EventLogNS
Class.Description: This is the Event Log page of the ZEN Ensemble application. With namespace support

XData.name: resultsPane
XData.Description: This pane displays event log activity table. User may click on a row and details are displayed to the side.
XData.Data: <pane> <vgroup valign="top"> <!--<spacer height="5"/>--> <tablePane id="table" cellSpacing="2" dataSource="columns" tableName="Ens_Util.Log" useSnapshot="false" showZebra="true" valueColumn="ID" maxRows="1000" useKeys="true" showQuery="false" onselectrow="zenPage.selectItem(zenThis);" nowrap="true" onmouseoverClass="tpMouseOver" enableToggleSelect="true" onupdate="setTimeout('zenPage.onAfterSearch();',50);" initialExecute="false" OnCreateResultSet="CheckConditions" unlockSession="true" > <!-- provide header values for all columns so they can be localized --> <column header="Type" colName="Type" style="text-align:left;" width="65" OnDrawCell="DrawLocalType" title="Alert, Assert, Error, Info, Trace, or Warning"/> <column header="ID" colName="ID" style="text-align:left;" width="90" title="Log Event ID"/> <column header="Namespace" colName="Namespace" style="text-align:left;" width="90" title="Namespace"/> <column header="Time Logged" colName="TimeLogged999" id="idTimeLogged999" width="180" colExpression="{fn RIGHT(%EXTERNAL(TimeLogged),999)}" title="Time the event was noted in the log" hidden="true" /> <column header="Time Logged" colName="TimeLogged12" id="idTimeLogged12" width="180" colExpression="{fn RIGHT(%EXTERNAL(TimeLogged),12)}" title="Time the event was noted in the log" /> <column header="Session" colName="SessionId" width="90" title="Identifier for the session in which the event occurred" link=" " OnDrawCell="DrawSessionCell" /> <column header="Job" colName="Job" width="90" title="System job in which the event occurred" OnDrawCell="DrawMethodCell" /> <column header="Source" colName="ConfigName" width="200" title="Ensemble configuration name of the item that triggered the event" OnDrawCell="DrawMethodCell" /> <column header="Text" colName="Text" width="1200" title="Descriptive text logged with the event" OnDrawCell="DrawTextCell" /> <column colName="TraceCat" hidden="true"/> <column colName="SourceClass" hidden="true"/> <column colName="SourceMethod" hidden="true"/> <!-- we will not be switching colors by user preference; we will always use zebra plus 1-column color coding --> <condition id="condAlert" colName="Type" predicate="EQ" value="Alert" targetCol="Type" cellStyle="background: yellow; color: darkred; font-weight: bold;" /> <condition id="condError" colName="Type" predicate="EQ" value="Error" targetCol="Type" cellStyle="background: pink; color: darkred; font-weight: bold;" /> <condition id="condWarning" colName="Type" predicate="EQ" value="Warning" targetCol="Type" cellStyle="background: orange; color: darkred; font-weight: bold;" /> <condition id="condAssert" colName="Type" predicate="EQ" value="Assert" targetCol="Type" cellStyle="background: silver; color: darkred; font-weight: bold;" /> <condition id="condTrace" colName="Type" predicate="EQ" value="Trace" targetCol="Type" cellStyle="background: lightblue; color: darkblue; font-weight: bold;" /> <!-- it does not work to have a condition Type EQ Info and also have Method EQ Start/StopProduction so no condition on Type EQ Info --> <condition id="condStart" colName="SourceMethod" predicate="EQ" value="StartProduction" targetCol="Type" cellStyle="background: lightgreen; color: darkgreen; font-weight: bold;" /> <condition id="condStop" colName="SourceMethod" predicate="EQ" value="StopProduction" targetCol="Type" cellStyle="background: lightgreen; color: darkgreen; font-weight: bold;" /> </tablePane> <!-- set default auto refresh to "None" --> <timer id="timer" ontimeout="zenPage.timeout(zenThis);" timeout="0"/> </vgroup> </pane>

Method.name: CheckConditions
Method.Description: Callback that is executed when creating the resultset for the main table. Returns <query>MultiTypeNS</query> class query
Method.Implementation:
Do:..#CANCANCELSEARCH ..PrepareCancel() Set pSC = $$$OK Set tRS = ""
Set tSearchCriteria = ..GetSearchCriteria()
Set tDefaults = $P(tSearchCriteria,"^",3) Set tConfigName = $S(""'=..matchSource:..matchSource, 1:$P(tDefaults,",",1)) Set tStartTime = $P(tDefaults,",",8) Set tEndTime = $P(tDefaults,",",9)
Set tEventTypes = $P(tSearchCriteria,"^",4) Set tTypeCount = 0 Set tEventNames = $lb("Assert","Error","Warning","Info","Trace","Alert") Set tTypes = "" For i=1:1:6 { Set tInclude = $P(tEventTypes,",",i) If $S(tInclude="true":1,tInclude="false":0,1:tInclude) { Set tTypeCount = tTypeCount + 1 Set tTypes = tTypes _ $listbuild($listget(tEventNames,i)) } }
Set tRS = ##class(%Library.ResultSet).%New("EnsPortal.EventLogNS:MultiType") #; Get inclusive StartID and EndID values Set tStartID = $piece(tSearchCriteria,",",6) Set tEndID = $piece(tSearchCriteria,",",7) If (tStartID && tEndID) && (tEndID < tStartID) { Set tTempID = tStartID Set tStartID = tEndID Set tEndID = tTempID } Set tMinID = $select(tStartID: tStartID-1, 1: "") Set tMaxID = $select(tEndID: tEndID+1, 1: "") Do ..AdjustMinMax(.tMinID,.tMaxID)
Set tConditions = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() Set:tMinID tConditions.MinID = tMinID Set:tMaxID tConditions.MaxID = tMaxID // Pick up any other restrictions Set tConditions.ConfigName = tConfigName Set tConditions.SourceClass = $piece(tDefaults,",",2) Set tConditions.SourceMethod = $piece(tDefaults,",",3) Set tConditions.Text = $piece(tDefaults,",",4) Set tConditions.Job = $piece(tDefaults,",",5) Set tConditions.SessionID = $piece(tDefaults,",",10) Set tConditions.NamespaceList = $P(tSearchCriteria,"^",8) Set tConditions.StartTime = tStartTime Set tConditions.EndTime = tEndTime
Set tDescending = $select($piece(tSearchCriteria,"^",1) = "Newest First": 1, 1: 0) Set pSC = tRS.Execute($listtostring(tTypes),tDescending,,tConditions) If $$$ISERR(pSC) Quit ""
Set pInfo.queryText = "EnsPortal.EventLogNS:MultiType class query" Set pInfo.queryExecuted = 1 Set tMaxRows = $P(tSearchCriteria,"^",5) If (tMaxRows = "") Set tMaxRows = 500 Set pInfo.rows = tMaxRows Quit tRS

Method.name: SaveDefaults
Method.Description: Save user's last search criteria into global for page default
Method.Implementation: For p = 1:1:$L(EventType,",") Set pv=$P(EventType,",",p),$P(EventType,",",p) = $S(pv="true":1,pv="false":0,1:pv) For p = 1:1:$L(States,",") Set pv=$P(States,",",p),$P(States,",",p) = $S(pv="true":1,pv="false":0,1:pv) Set AutoRefresh = $S(AutoRefresh="true":1,AutoRefresh="false":0,1:AutoRefresh) Do ..SetDefaultString(SortOrder_"^"_TimeFormat_"^"_Defaults_"^"_EventType_"^"_MaxRows_"^"_States_"^"_AutoRefresh _"^"_ NamespaceList)

Method.name: SetDefaultString
GetAndUseDefaults
Method.Description: Method called from <method>%OnAfterCreatePage</method> to get defaults and build up the initial display

Method.name: ConstructWhereCause
Method.Description: Construct WHERE part of an SQL statement.

Method.name: ConstructWhereConditions
Method.Description: Construct WHERE <Condition(s)> part of an SQL statement. Returns empty string if there is no conditions.

Method.name: ConstructOrgerByCause
Method.Description: Construct ORDER BY part of an SQL statement.
Method.Implementation: Set tOrder = $select(pDescending: "DESC", 1: "ASC") Quit " ORDER BY ID " _ tOrder

Method.name: MultiTypeExecute
MultiTypeFetch
GetEnsembleNamespaces
Method.Description: Returns info about availible Ensemble-enabled Namespaces

Method.name: AdjustMinMax
Method.Description: Ensure that we check the table's sql to see whether there is any paging based on a condition on "ID" This is OK (for now) because the main StartID and EndID restrictions use conditions on "%ID"

Method.name: onSearchHandler
Method.Description: User clicked the Search button, user changed a Quick Search or Event Type criterion, or we have completed a non-zero Purge.
